Question.Subject: How can I create multiple email accounts quickly?
Question.Content: I need to create around 10-20 email accounts for a project I'm working on, but I don't want to sit down and go through the tedious process of finding a valid username and password, filling out the captcha, etc. Is there any way I can do this quickly and easily, or at least an email hosting service that doesn't take 10 minutes to create an account?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
try otherinbox.com
There, you setup one e-mail account, then can use multiple names for instance if
MyEmail is your user name, then you can use
NASCAR@MyEmail.otherinbox.com and AmerAirlines@MyEmail.otherinbox.com and FromMom@MyEmail.otherinbox.com
It is free - for limited use - messages only kept 30 days. But you can have them forwarded to another e-mail address.

Answer.Content: When ya do let us know! lol
